website_summaries.verdict: The best budget set of motorcycle panniers compatible with a wide range of brands.
pros: High quality leather provides a basic level of weatherproof and durability
Boxy interior space makes it easy to fit large, awkward objects in the bags
cons: Durability is not high enough to survive long highway rides or extreme weather

customer_reviews.title: These were the rights size for my suzuki boulevard s40 ...
customer_reviews.text: These were the rights size for my suzuki boulevard s40 as it's a small cruiser bike.need saddle bag support bars for 100% fitment. (Separate purchase or build your own)
customer_reviews.author: Rossco

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, these were the perfect size for my bike not too bulky but gives you enough cargo space to carry some stuff with you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great budget choice
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Yamaha 250 V Star, small cruiser. They fit very nicely, look good and appear serviceable for carrying the kinds of loads I was looking for. The price is excellent. Time will tell about durability but at this price, they are a value. The were shipped and received quickly.
customer_reviews.author: gordon

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Just put these on my Harley 1200 Sportster. Surprisingly good quality, as good as saddlebags I've seen that cost twice as much. They are just the right size for a smaller bike and for carrying just a few essentials - the size of the bags does not overwhelm the bike. Came with a rope to tie together and four zip ties to secure the bags. For the money, a great alternative to more expensive bags out there. Will see how they last over time.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and nice fit!!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality and easy to install. Looks like it was supposed to be there. Pretty decent size for knick knacks. Will do another review after awhile if not working. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: MarlonB

customer_reviews.title: There nice
customer_reviews.text: As I said there nice but finding the sweet spot where they don't rub on the chain of my rebel is impossible had em one day, and they got nicked I'm super booty hurt. What ever nothing I can do now, just beware before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Not that good
customer_reviews.text: Lost a rivet and couldn’t close one side for the last 100 miles of a 600mile trip. Fixed with a small bolt. Not the greatest, but for the price they will work for now. I will end up, up grading to something better with a lock.
customer_reviews.author: shawn hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bags for a small bike
customer_reviews.text: These bags work and look great on my 250 Yamaha. Can't say material wise how long they will hold up. The price was decent so I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rockoo

customer_reviews.title: good buy.
customer_reviews.text: For the the low cost its good invest, im recommend just for small scooters my moto is a yamaha bws (Zuma) in USA.. i add a pretty nice decals and look great :)
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Fits Suzuki Savage perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Good price and surprisingly fast shipping from China. Received them in 8 days. They fit my Suzuki Savage perfectly
customer_reviews.author: T. Rohman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Didn't want anything expensive and bulky, this was the perfect option. Had it set to the longest setting. The bags have a picture hanger loop on the bottom, used that to zip-tie it to non-moving parts to keep it from flapping on the highway, worked out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Size is as written. Photo makes them look larger. However PERFECT for my bike due to the rear directionals. Fit perfectally in front of them, and size allwoed passangers legs to clear. Great day trip bags.
customer_reviews.author: Rufus

customer_reviews.title: I just love them
customer_reviews.text: Big enough to keep Laptop, books and a tool set in a safe place. After hours of riding in the rain, I have to say I am positive surpriced. Everyting is dry.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks great, fits even better!!. for the price you won't be disappointed!.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall really nice bags!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the size and look but noticed that there was a mark on one with a closer look I realized it was sharpie and under the sharpie was a small scratch. So yeah.... removed the sharpie with alcohol. The scratch is better than the sharpie mark.
customer_reviews.author: Rich & Holly

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2016 Harley dyna wide glide
customer_reviews.text: This fits a Harley dyna wide glide with some modifications. The shipping is a little slow. I would have given this 4 stars but it's foam rubber but it is still a cheap solution to wide glide bags.
customer_reviews.author: michael massie

customer_reviews.title: Only got one...
customer_reviews.text: Who needs one saddle bag? It says a pair, it shows a pair, but only received one item. I sent it back...
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great!
customer_reviews.text: The material feels good and looks amazing on my Vespa, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: christy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price paid
customer_reviews.text: For the price paid they are fine saddle bags. I use them on my 2018 Honda Rebel 300.
customer_reviews.author: Samson

customer_reviews.title: Good product good price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install . Good looking . Installed on my triump bonnoville. Material is not the best
customer_reviews.author: Cricrip

customer_reviews.title: Iron horse chopper
customer_reviews.text: My bike is close to a bobber so I had to be creative. I cut into the leather so they could go over my directional lights. works and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: CY

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: They looked like quality leather saddle bags when I first received them, but after riding around with them empty most of the time, the seams are coming apart and the outer layer is getting tattered. I guess from the wind, because they're starting to look like they've been dragged around on the pavement.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L.

customer_reviews.title: fit well, look nice
customer_reviews.text: These bags work very well on my '87 Honda 1100 Shadow. Fit well and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the bags. The only thing I would suggest is making the straps adjustable. If it had adjustable straps then these would be the best fitted bags for the money.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: They will work fine for my extra motorcycle that my son rides
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat small and cheap construction. They will work fine for my extra motorcycle that my son rides.
customer_reviews.author: Sean N

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Fit my bike perfect! They are smaller than normal I like that
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B

customer_reviews.title: just 1 saddlebag not 2 as most items are
customer_reviews.text: be aware although this product references saddlebags it is for only 1 saddlebag.....item description should be changed to singular not plural to avoid confusion and future returns...
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ostrow

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Look fantastic on the bike. I would recommend drilling holes on the inside so that way you mount it to the bike. It fits on the Honda rebel 500.
customer_reviews.author: Isaih Serna

customer_reviews.title: Size is small
customer_reviews.text: It looks bigger in the picture. Also it is cheaper now than when I bought it 2 weeks ago
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Calderbank

customer_reviews.title: Won't fit on my motorcycle even though they advertise I will.
customer_reviews.text: It will not work on my motorcycle,.a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmay

customer_reviews.title: One side fell off within 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in December based off of the awesome reviews. One broke off not even 6 months later. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Fit well, look good
customer_reviews.text: It is a little small if you have a big bike. Look good on mine.
customer_reviews.author: Johny

customer_reviews.title: Looks, and functions very well. Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for the price. Fits great on my Royal Enfield Classic 500. Only negative is the strap is non-adjustible.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very happy with product, well made and east to install
customer_reviews.author: Tom

product_meta.title: Motorcycle Saddle Bags, 2 Pack Universal PU Leather Saddlebags for Honda Shadow Suzuki Boulevard Sportster
feature_bullets: 【7.4L Capacity】Available to carry some stuff during riding. Measures 10.24x9.45x4.57in. large enough to store raincoats, water bottle, lighters, sunglasses, wallet, house keys, phone, lock,food and other daily necessities.

【Stable Shape】There's a plastic liner on the interior wall of saddlebags for adding stability, help it maintain it's shape. There are two side flaps which can help keep from water for a short period in light rain, but heavy rain will soak it.
【Easy to install】It comes with a cord which you could use to fasten the side bags together. And the quick release buckles on the saddle bags let you get into them in a snap
【Wide Fitment】Fit for Most of motorcycle models, such as sportster dyna Vespa Yamaha Honda Suzuki zn700
For any problem of the product, please feel free to email us via Amazon.We will do our best to solve them.

specifications.Special Features: Waterproof Saddle Bag, Large Capacity Saddle Bag, PU Leather Saddle Bag, Motorcycle Pannier Bags
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars105 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
